name: cosmologically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that involves or relates to the scientific study of the nature and origin of the universe : Water is cosmologically abundant in the universe. The Hubble Space Telescope has provided a huge amount of cosmologically relevant data.
in a way that involves or relates to religious or spiritual theories about the nature and origin of the universe : Among the ancient Maya, shell is considered to be linked cosmologically to water, life, and fertility. Getting even close to understanding such a sophisticated, cosmologically advanced culture takes many years.
More examplesFewer examplesThese quasars are among the brightest optically, and the most distant cosmologically.The shape may cosmologically represent water.The emphasis on peaceful interaction among the members of the society is cosmologically constructed.
